Instructions (make account, login, taking BP and home page). 1. Sign up and log in. 2. Fill up personal information. 3. Connect the BP device (Blood Pressure Device) to BP Care application. Or mobile device. 4. At the home page click the (start taking blood pressure button) to start getting the blood pressure. 5. Donâ€™t click anything until the results show in screen. 6. The result will be shown in screen and it will recommend meal plan for your blood pressure result.
(Clinic finder) 1. Open location in main settings of the mobile device. 2. Go to clinic finder to show the exact location of the user. 3. It will show different clinics near the user. 4. Click and pin specific clinic. 5. The clinic finder will show the approximate time of travel with different types (walking, car, commute, biking). 6. Click prefer trips and the clinic finder will start.
(History) 1. After taking blood pressure the result will be saved in history. 2. Click text box to show the whole results. 3. Long press the text box and it will show the delete option.
(Profile) 1. In profile will show the entire information of the user and graph of blood pressure results of the user. 2. Click the edit profile in the upper right side of the app. 3. The user can edit personal information one by one.
(Settings) 1. In settings the user will see all the clickable textbox (button) that includes: notification, instructions, feedback, privacy and security, help and support, and about. 2. In notification the user can personally on and off the notification button. 3. In instructions the user can see all the step by steps instructions and definitions of all the buttons and pages of the system. 4. In feedback the user can give their own feedback based on what they notice in the system. 5. In privacy and support is where the user can personally change the password and other information of the account. 6. In about is all about the founder and owner of the system.
